EmailTemplate.name: 2024 - Q4 - Education (NY, NJ)
EmailTemplate.subject: Are you ready to add more classroom space for {!Account.Name}?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello! Are you ready to add more classroom space next year? BOXX Modular is here to support you with leasing or purchasing modular classroom buildings.
Explore the full selection on our website:
--> View modular classrooms https://www.boxxmodular.com/classrooms/
--> View modular offices https://www.boxxmodular.com/offices/
--> View used buildings inventory https://www.boxxmodular.com/used-modular/?restroom=0&areamin=0&areamax=null
BOXX has been approved as a vendor by TIPS USA and Sourcewell purchasing cooperatives!
To connect with us for more information:
--> Reply to this email
--> Request a quote on our website https://www.boxxmodular.com/quote-request/
--> Call 877-966-7839 to speak with one of our local experts
We are here to help!
